LightningComponentBundle.description: Showcase for your B2B Commerce products. *Products shown in preview may not reflect actual products in your community.

property.name: featuredProductsHeading
property.label: Heading
property.description: Heading text to display above the component

property.name: showSKU
property.label: Show SKU
property.description: Toggle the display of product SKU

property.name: showDescription
property.label: Show Description
property.description: Toggle the display of product description

property.name: includePrices
property.label: Show Prices
property.description: Toggle the display of pricing information

property.name: productSource
property.label: Products Source
property.description: Display products via list of SKUs or a designated category ID

property.name: skuList
property.label: SKU List
property.description: Comma separated list of SKUs to display

property.name: categoryId
property.label: Category ID
property.description: The ID of the category to from which to populate products

property.name: fieldApiName
property.label: Field API Name
property.description: The API name of the Product field you want to query. Only fields of type String, Picklist and Boolean may be used.

property.name: compareType
property.label: Compare Type
property.description: The type of comparison to perform

property.name: fieldValue
property.label: Field Value
property.description: The value of the Product field. For Boolean fields, enter true or false.

property.name: effectiveAccountId
property.label: Effective Account Id (BETA)
property.description: The ID of the account under which the user is acting (BETA)
